email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I have a client looking to move 100,000 MT of crude oil from Rotterdam to Singapore. The laycan is 15-20 October. Could you provide a freight quote for this? Looking forward to your response. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for reaching out. For this shipment, we can offer a rate in the low 50s, say $50.50 per MT. Let me know if this works for your client. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for the quick response. My client is considering the offer but is hoping for a rate closer to $49.75 per MT. Would you be able to adjust your quote? Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, I understand your client's position. Given the current market, the best I can do is $50.00 per MT. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for the revised quote. My client has agreed to $50.00 per MT. Let’s proceed with the fixture. Could you confirm the vessel details and laycan? Also, what are your demurrage terms? Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, great to hear. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, DWT 120,000, LOA 250m. Laycan remains 15-20 October. Demurrage is $20,000 per day pro rata. I’ll send over the fixture recap shortly. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for the details. Everything looks good. Please proceed with the fixture recap. Looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, Sarah
